title: Microlearning Design in Mathematics for Bridging Learning Opportunity Gaps

context.additional_context: Provides customized content using a learning representative system to enhance job-linked mathematical competencies for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can solve workplace mathematical problems with 80% accuracy
Learners can confirm at least three opportunities for collaborative learning with peer learners through learning representatives
Consistently engage with microlearning content at least three times per week in a mobile environment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
